displayName.en: Energy Recovery Device

description.en: An asset component that transfers energy between two different streams of air.

displayName.en: Nominal Enthalpy Recovery Ratio (ERR)

description.en: Indicates the nominal enthalpy recovery ratio for the Energy Recovery Device, essential for efficiency assessment.

displayName.en: Energy Recovery Method

description.en: Defines the method utilized for energy recovery in the Energy Recovery Device, impacting system performance.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Air Pressure Drop

description.en: Represents the supply cooling air pressure drop across the Energy Recovery Device, important for airflow calculations.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Minimum Airflow Rating

description.en: Specifies the minimum airflow rating for the cooling supply within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Maximum Airflow Rating

description.en: Defines the maximum airflow rating for the cooling supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Eirflow

description.en: Indicates the design airflow value for the cooling supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Represents the design entering dry bulb temperature for the cooling supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Specifies the design leaving dry bulb temperature for the cooling supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Indicates the design entering wet bulb temperature for the cooling supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Defines the design leaving wet bulb temperature for the cooling supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Air Pressure Drop

description.en: Measures the air pressure drop for the heating supply within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Minimum Airflow Rating

description.en: Specifies the minimum airflow rating for the heating supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Maximum Airflow Rating

description.en: Defines the maximum airflow rating for the heating supply within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Eirflow

description.en: Indicates the design airflow value for the heating supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Represents the design entering dry bulb temperature for the heating supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Specifies the design leaving dry bulb temperature for the heating supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Indicates the design entering wet bulb temperature for the heating supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Defines the design leaving wet bulb temperature for the heating supply in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Air Pressure Drop

description.en: Measures the air pressure drop for the cooling exhaust within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Minimum Airflow Rating

description.en: Specifies the minimum airflow rating for the cooling exhaust in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Maximum Airflow Rating

description.en: Defines the maximum airflow rating for the cooling exhaust within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Eirflow

description.en: Indicates the design airflow value for the cooling exhaust in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Represents the design entering dry bulb temperature for the cooling exhaust in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Represents the dry bulb temperature of leaving air in the exhaust cooling design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Indicates the wet bulb temperature of entering air in the exhaust cooling design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Specifies the wet bulb temperature of leaving air in the exhaust cooling design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Air Pressure Drop

description.en: Measures the air pressure drop across the exhaust heating section of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Minimum Airflow Rating

description.en: Defines the minimum airflow rating for the exhaust heating function of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Maximum Airflow Rating

description.en: Specifies the maximum airflow rating for the exhaust heating function of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Eirflow

description.en: Represents the design airflow parameter for the exhaust heating system within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Indicates the dry bulb temperature of entering air in the design for exhaust heating of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature

description.en: Represents the dry bulb temperature of leaving air in the exhaust heating design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Specifies the wet bulb temperature of entering air in the exhaust heating design for the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature

description.en: Indicates the wet bulb temperature of leaving air in the exhaust heating design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Air Pressure Drop Unit

description.en: Defines the unit of measurement for chilling air pressure drop in the supply cooling function of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Minimum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Specifies the unit for the minimum airflow rating in the supply cooling process of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Maximum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Indicates the unit of measurement for the maximum airflow rating in the supply cooling function of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Airflow Unit

description.en: Represents the unit for the design airflow in the cooling supply configuration of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Defines the unit of measurement for the dry bulb temperature of entering air in the design cooling supply of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Specifies the unit for the dry bulb temperature of leaving air in the design cooling supply process of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Coolign Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Indicates the unit of measurement for the entering air wet bulb temperature in the cooling design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Cooling Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Defines the unit used for the wet bulb temperature of leaving air in the cooling design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Air Pressure Drop Unit

description.en: Represents the unit of measurement for the air pressure drop across the supply heating section of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Minimum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Represents the minimum airflow rating for the supply heating system in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Maximum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Specifies the maximum airflow rating for the supply heating component of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Airflow Unit

description.en: Defines the design airflow rate intended for the supply heating function of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Indicates the entering air dry bulb temperature for the supply heating design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Identifies the leaving air dry bulb temperature in the supply heating design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Coolign Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Specifies the entering air wet bulb temperature for the supply heating design in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Supply Heating Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Represents the leaving air wet bulb temperature for the supply heating design in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Air Pressure Drop Unit

description.en: Defines the air pressure drop unit for the exhaust cooling operation of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Minimum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Indicates the minimum airflow rating for the exhaust cooling function in the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Maximum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Specifies the maximum airflow rating for the exhaust cooling operation of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Airflow Unit

description.en: Represents the design airflow rate for the exhaust cooling functionality within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Defines the entering air dry bulb temperature used in the design of exhaust cooling for the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Indicates the leaving air dry bulb temperature for the exhaust cooling design segment of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Coolign Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Specifies the entering air wet bulb temperature in the design of the exhaust cooling system of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Cooling Design Leaving Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Represents the leaving air wet bulb temperature for the exhaust cooling design within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Air Pressure Drop Unit

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Minimum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Indicates the minimum airflow requirement for the exhaust heating section of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Maximum Airflow Rating Unit

description.en: Specifies the maximum airflow rating for the exhaust heating function within the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Airflow Unit

description.en: Represents the design airflow rate intended for the exhaust heating component of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Entering Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Indicates the entering air dry bulb temperature for the exhaust heating design of the Energy Recovery Device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Heating Design Leaving Air Dry Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Specifies the dry bulb temperature of leaving air in the exhaust heating design of the energy recovery device.

displayName.en: Exhaust Coolign Design Entering Air Wet Bulb Temperature Unit

description.en: Defines the wet bulb temperature of entering air in the exhaust heating design of the energy recovery device.
